name: MockPriceSubmitter
description: Price submitter. A contract used to submit/reveal prices to multiple Flare Time Series Oracles in one transaction.

eventDecorators.name: PriceHashesSubmitted
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when price hashes were submitted through PriceSubmitter.

eventDecorators.name: PricesRevealed
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when prices were revealed through PriceSubmitter.

functionDecorators.name: revealPrices
functionDecorators.description: Reveals submitted prices during epoch reveal periodThe hash of _price and _random must be equal to the submitted hashEmits PricesRevealed event.

parameterDecorators.name: _epochId
parameterDecorators.description: Id of the epoch in which the price hashes was submitted.

parameterDecorators.name: _prices
parameterDecorators.description: List of submitted prices in USD.

functionDecorators.name: submitPriceHashes
functionDecorators.description: Submits price hashes for current epochEmits PriceHashesSubmitted event.

parameterDecorators.name: _hashes
parameterDecorators.description: List of hashed price and random number.

functionDecorators.name: voterWhitelistBitmap
functionDecorators.description: Returns bitmap of all ftso's for which `_voter` is allowed to submit prices/hashes. If voter is allowed to vote for ftso at index (see *_FTSO_INDEX), the corrsponding bit in the result will be 1.

functionDecorators.name: voterWhitelisted
functionDecorators.description: Called from whitelister when new voter has been whitelisted.

functionDecorators.name: votersRemovedFromWhitelist
functionDecorators.description: Called from whitelister when one or more voters have been removed.
